15 Jun 2012

6W Engineering: 6Wunderkinder at Railsberry 2012 in Krakow

A blog post on the 6Wunderkinder Engineering blog I just published.

6wengineering:

21 speakers, about 350 visitors from all over the world, two awesome parties,

1200 kilometres on the road, a picturesque old city with delicious food and way too many beers. These are just some of the facts about the Railsberry conference in Krakow, Poland where we, the Rails developers…
